name: TextWalker
description:
Well this is my game for MiniLD #63 with the theme "Fusion"

I guess my game is shorter then expected but ,as I have other things played, my time ran out.

I still hope you enjoy the concept!


Note:

Don't worry the launcher may be bigger then the game itself.

If the game is too big (or too small) change it with in the launcher's options.


Controls:

A/D: Move

Space: Jump

E: Shoot

P: Pause
